title: Shape Hunt with Positional Words

steps.prompt: Use the point or line tools to outline shapes you see on the canvas.
Describe where each shape lives using words like above, below, or beside.
Click each shape and name it aloud or in the text box.

successCriteria: Learner names at least three shapes and describes their position accurately.

title: Compose Shapes from Parts

steps.prompt: Use triangles and rectangles to compose a house.
Select each part and list which shapes you used.
Explain how the parts fit together to make the whole.

successCriteria: Learner creates a composite figure and explains how the pieces relate.

title: Partition Shapes into Equal Shares

steps.prompt: Partition the rectangle into four equal squares.
Partition the circle into three equal wedges.
Explain why the shares are equal.

successCriteria: Learner creates equal shares and justifies the equality.
